item.description:
UPDATE: GET THERE EARLY!
Tommy's fills up very quickly on Paddy's Day and there'll be a long line (potentially in the snow) if you don't!

Meanwhile....

Let's get together and have a few in honor of St. Paddy (not that we need an excuse!).
Food here is very good, so plan to eat.

If you have trouble finding the place call me on my cell - 617 840 4131 (Heidi) or 978-289-2364 (Steve).

Come prepared to party!

/Heidi, Chris, Steve and Ruth

(PS wear green or orange - the orange always throws the yanks!)
item.how_to_find_us: Steve will be in a green/blue striped Guinness shirt (drinking a Mai Tai)

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: St. Patrick's Day
